apply().Description: Applies all of the metadata changes that have been set since the MediaMetadataEditor instance was created with @B_android#media#RemoteController#editMetadata_E@ or since @B_android#media#MediaMetadataEditor#clear_E@ was called.
apply().history: Added in API level 19 Deprecated in API level 29

ClassDesc: A class to read the metadata published by a @B_android#media#RemoteControlClient_E@, or send a @B_android#media#RemoteControlClient_E@ new values for keys that can be edited.
